texts.name: Gemma
texts.biography: Gemma used to be a subordinate from Captain Bidley, she considered to train females as pirates during the war for establishing Regnan Union. Now she has her own ship and a loyal troop which constituted by female pirates.

specialty.name: Bounty Hunters
specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Bounty Hunter or Treasure Hunter for each level attained after 3rd level.
